{{tt|std::experimental::nonesuch}} is a class type used by {{ltt|cpp/experimental/is_detected|std::experimental::detected_t}} to indicate detection failure. 

{{tt|nonesuch}} has no default constructor or initializer-list constructor, and is not an aggregate.

===Notes===
{{tt|nonesuch}} cannot be constructed, destroyed, or copied.
